mapper.insert: insert into trip_info(no, user_id, title, content, admission, opentime,w_date , city, postcode, address, photo, on_off, p_link, up_view, views, likes) values(#{no},#{user_id},#{title},#{content},#{admission},#{opentime},now(), #{city},#{postcode},#{address},#{photo},"y","n","n",0,0)
insert into trip_view_info(no, user_id, content) values(#{no}, #{user_id}, #{content})
mapper.delete: delete trip_info, trip_view_info from trip_view_info left join trip_info on (trip_view_info.no = trip_info.no) where trip_view_info.no = #{no}
